author: Ross Burden
method: In a bowl mix together the mushrooms, red onion, orange zest, bacon, Stilton, parsley, olive oil and balsamic vinegar.  Heat a griddle pan and griddle the bread for two minutes on each side. Serve the salad on top of the grilled bread, topped with the garlic.
ingredients: 1 field mushroom, sliced,  Â½ red onion, sliced,  1 orange, zest only,  1 slice bacon, fried and sliced,  85g/3oz Stilton, crumbled,  2 handfuls fresh flatleaf parsley,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  3 cloves garlic, sliced and fried,  1 slice bread, cut into a thick round
